Name: Higgs Boson: Minimal Puzzle
About the game: Higgs Boson: Minimal Puzzle is a short and relaxing experience where the player must rotate pieces to assemble a particle accelerator. Rotate the pieces to form a geometric shape and make the particles collide with each other; Featuring: 30 levels that make the player think and act always in an intelligent way; Relaxing soundtrack; Assemble the puzzles Move the synchronized parts
